identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a polished, competitive, and trustworthy Web3 tournament platform on Monad.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Design with Gaming Aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'live' and 'high-stakes'.
Content is King: The Tournament Bracket is the hero.
Negative Space: Use white space to create a premium feel.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Tournament names

background.description: Clean White with very pale lavender tints

grid_system.arena_header: flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-end gap-6

buttons.primary: bg-[#836EF9] text-white hover:bg-[#6D5ACF] shadow-lg shadow-purple-500/20 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#0F0F11] border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-purple-200

cards.base: bg-white border border-gray-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md hover:border-purple-200 transition-all duration-300
cards.tournament_card: group relative overflow-hidden p-6 flex flex-col gap-4

inputs.base: bg-gray-50 border-gray-200 focus:border-[#836EF9] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-100 rounded-lg

logo_mark.description: Abstract geometric purple pattern to be used as a brand mark or masked logo element.

hero_texture.description: Soft purple/white abstract texture for hero backgrounds or section dividers.

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients of white and pale lavender (#F3F0FF) to avoid flatness.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Space Grotesk' and 'DM Sans' via Google Fonts in index.html or Next.js font optimizer.
2. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific Monad Purple (#836EF9) as 'primary'.
3. LOBBY DESIGN: Create a 'Bento' grid for the tournament list. Use the 'hero_texture' as a subtle background for the page header.
4. BRACKET UI: Build a custom bracket component using Flexbox/Grid. Do NOT use a library if it looks generic. Use thin gray lines (#E5E7EB) for connectors.
5. WALLET CONNECT: Style the Connect Button to be the most prominent action in the header (Solid Purple).
6. DO NOT use dark mode by default. The user explicitly requested a White + Monad Purple theme.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
No Inter for Headings: Use Space Grotesk.
Micro-Interactions: Add hover states to every card and button.
Data-TestID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
